title: @Riot, can people who disconnect and cause a /Remake please be banned from Ranked for the day.
body:
Right now I get 5-10 minute queues. Plus draft. Plus load screen. Then 3 minutes until we can /Remake.

Because some knob didn't check their ping before joining queue or because they're trying to play on some shitty laptop I've now wasted ~20 minutes.

replies.body:
Not everyone can afford a high end gaming pc or a fast connection bro lol.

Stop being a %%%% and do something else while waiting for the queue lmao. 

I've gotten lots of remake recently and who gives a shet, what's more frustrating is when someone afks mid game and never comes back
Yeah because online gaming should be exclusively for people who can afford high quality gaming rigs
See. This guy knows what's up.
Yea but not everyone lives near a power station and have 9 ms

*Phone station with 21ms ping.

If you can't play then don't play. Before this season I was still playing with like 100ms ping and the game was unplayable when other people were home. Or I waited until they were all asleep out on days when I wasn't at uni. I didn't blindly go into games, I checked my ping for 5-10 minutes before I even queued up. I didn't ruin games for people.
No, they can't, because they have not broken any major TnCs or the summoners code.

> No, they can't, because they have not broken any major TnCs or the summoners code.

Its in the terms and conditions that your connections to the game and going afk is on you, except for server related issues.
It is on you, but it's not bannable because it's not directly your fault
